name: Peacock Eggs
description: Three pretty Peacock Pearls swing delightfully from a strand of tiny Ocean Blue seed Pearls. Pale sage Green Swarovski Crystals accent the Pearls. Sterling Silver chain and toggle clasp. 18 inches. A great everyday piece.

name: Delicate Keishi Rope
description: Tiny Champagne tone top drilled Keishi Pearls are combined here with Swarovski Crystals and tiny hammered 14K GF beads. So delicate and pretty. 14K GF toggle clasp. 18 inches. Just lovely.

name: My Darling
description: Who could resist this sweet double strand of Pale Pink tiny Coin Pearls accented with pretty White round Pearls. Lightweight and so pretty on the wrist. 14K GF clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Pretty Combo
description: Pale Pink eP shaped Pearls complimented with tiny pale Silver Lentil Pearls and Sterling Silver disk beads are a pretty combination. Unexpected charm. Sterling Silver clasp. 8 inches.

name: Dual Delight
description: Fun White top drilled Pearls mixed with classic round Pearls circle your wrist willly nilly. Lots of visual movement. 14K GF Spring Ring Clasp. 8 inches.

name: Silver In My Pocket
description: Silver tone Coin Pearls are accented in this piece with sweet silver Lentil Pearls. The perfect metallic addition to your Pearl stash. Sterling Silver Spring Ring clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Old Time Hollywood
description: Love this chunky statement bracelet! Such great style and weight. Designed with three sizes of Pearls, it looks so glamorous on the wrist. A piece you will go to again and again. 14K Brushed Vermeil Toggle clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Pink Perfection
description: This is a classic bracelet. Beautiful egg shaped Pale Pink Pearls are highlighted with tiny hammered Sterling Silver beads and finished with a Sterling Silver Spring Ring clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Sweet Leaf Pearls
description: Delicate and shimmery, these White top drilled Pearls and alternating sweet round pearls create a pretty & lightweight bracelet. 14K GF toggle clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Double Peach Delight
description: A double strand of Pretty Pale Pink Coin Pearls in two sizes create a soft cuff effect. Feels silky and so pretty on the wrist. Sterling Silver Spring Ring Clasp. 7.5 inches

name: Fire Sticks
description: Copper rules the day in this earring design. A beautiful neutral metallic, you'll wear these often. Accented with 14K GF beads, so lightweight and pretty. Don't resist, you need these!

name: Delicate Delight
description: Tear drop Peacock Blue Pearl and a sweet pale grey Lentil Pearl are accented with both Sterling Silver beads and an interesting cone shaped Balinese Bead. Eclectic. Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: A Perfect Pair
description: These are the perfect pair of white coin Pearl earring's. A diminutive size white coin pearl accented with 14K GF rice beads giving the earring swing and a bit of length. 14K GF ear wires.

name: Green Leaf Power
description: A stack of three green Keishi Pearls. Lightweight and alive with color and movement, accented with tiny hammered 14K GF beads. These abstract earrings's are a Future Pearl Company favorite. 14K GF ear wires.

name: White Delight
description: These are the perfect pair of earring's. White Pearls stacked and accented with Sterling Silver beads. Great for every day or a night out, either way, a winner. Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Pale Pink Classic Coins
description: Classic Diminutive Pale Pink Coin Pearls, so delicate and pretty. A nice length too, 20 inches. Finished with a 14K GF pearl safety clasp. The perfect gift for the Pearl Girl in your world.

name: Ocean Blue and Pale Grey
description: These are the perfect pair of soft Pale Grey Coin Pearl earring's for the Pearl girl who loves Blue. A tiny accent of deep Ocean Blue Swarovski crystals and Sterling Silver beads. Love the length too. Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Jazzy Classic
description: The classic., with a bit of Jazz. Pillowy white Pearls are accented with a 14K Hammered Satin Vermeil bead and a tiny contrasting 14K GF hammered bead. Finished with 14K GF French Lever backs. You need these you jazzy Pearl girl!

name: White Coin Pearl Cuff
description: Not a cuff in the traditional sense, but these lovely white coins are large and commanding. The pretty white stick pearls have a lovely luster and define each of the larger pearls. 7.5 inches, 14 K Gold Filled hook & eye clasp.

name: Colinda's Copper
description: A simple circlet of Copper Pearls alternating with Satin Amber Swarovski crystals. Great everyday go-to piece. Comfortable. 14K GF Spring Ring clasp.

name: Never Dull
description: A pretty and pillowy  pale Silver Coin Pearl is featured here with Sterling Silver beads and French Lever back earring's. Perfect.

name: Double, No Trouble
description: Double your fun with these snappy earring's. Two sweet white coin pearls accented with tiny  Sterling Silver beads are playful and fun for any occasion. Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Party Drops
description: Love these tear drop pale Sage Pearls accented with deep sea green Swarovski crystals and 14K Vermeil hammered beads. The perfect party pair! 14K GF ear wires.

name: Pretty in Pink
description: What a lovely strand of pretty pale pin Pearls, so beautiful knotted and finished with round 14K GF filigree box clasp. Classic.

name: Chain Link Love
description: Beautiful organic shaped white Pearl Pendant is center stage on this chain pearl link necklace. Great piece with jeans and a sweater for some fun Winter pop. Sterling Silver wire and clasp, 18 inches, with extension.

name: Tiny Whites
description: A petite White Coin Pearl earring, just right for everyday. Simply presented on Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Are You Blue?
description: If your blue, you need these earring's. A deep midnight Blue Coin Pearl, intense and simply presented on 14K GF ear wires.

name: Demure Delight
description: A quiet pair of earring's. Two sweet pale Pewter Pearls are stacked with Sterling Silver beads. Simple but noteworthy. A great everyday earring.

name: Sweet Stack
description: Love these! So playful. Petite top drilled white Pearls are stacked above a pretty Sea Green, blue cast, teardrop Pearl. Lightweight too. 14 K GF French lever back's.

name: Woodland Cheer
description: Sweet white round Pearls dangle gently from a vintage filigree bead, accented with tiny black Swarovski Crystals. 14K GF ear wires. Quiet elegance.

name: Pale Pink Moonrise
description: Beautiful shimmery pale pink Coin Pearls rise above a center drilled Keishi pearl creating a pretty moonscape just for you. 14K Gf French lever backs. Unique.

name: Classic White
description: Perfection. My favorite go to piece, the classic White Coin Pearl Necklace. Pretty White Coin Pearls, traditionally knotted, made contemporary with a Sterling Silver toggle clasp. 18 inches.

name: Solitary
description: A pair of earring's that every woman needs. These White Coin Pearls are round and pillowy, not flat. A tiny hammered 14K GF bead is the perfect single accent. 14K GF French lever backs.

name: Simplicity
description: A sugar white, single dew drop Pearl hangs delicately from a Sterling Silver ear wire. What could be more lovely? A simple Pearl earring for every day.

name: Must Haves
description: Sweet White Coin Pearls hang delicately with a tiny hammered Sterling Silver bead. This is a diminutive pair of Pearls, a modest size when a larger coin is just too much of a statement. Lovely for a petite woman. Sometimes less is more.

name: Tamborine
description: Pretty White Coin Pearls are paired here with a Champagne Pearls and accented with 14K GF beads and Ear Wires. A little length and fancy fun.

name: Three Times the Fun
description: A round steely Grey Pearl Is accented with two organic shaped light Pewter Pearls and tiny hammered Sterling Silver beads and ear wires. A pretty Winter metallic earring to add to your Pearl wardrobe.

name: Seeing Double Green
description: So pretty and unique, a double strand of lovely Mossy Green Coin Pearls, knotted with golden silk and finished with a pretty 14K brushed Vermeil clasp. 18 inches.

name: Coin Classic
description: Exactly what I was looking for. This is what we hear time and time again in the studio. What could be more perfect than an 18 inch, knotted, luminous white coin pearl necklace? Great everyday piece in your pearl stash, perfect for the bride and her maids too. We love this choice for wedding's, the bridal party appreciates any piece of their ensemble that can be worn after the special day.

name: Pearl Pale Peach Perfection
description: A sweet strand of tiny pale peach / champagne colored coin pearls, knotted with white silk and finished with a dainty decorative 14K Gold Filled round box clasp. 17 inches. Matching earring available upon request.

name: Silver Coin Pearls
description: What a strand! Pale silver toned pillowy coin pearls, knotted w/ grey silk & finished w/ a beautiful Sterling Silver toggle clasp. This color in nicer coin pearls is difficult to find & every Spring we hunt for them. This year we were lucky! You will be too if you make these your own. 18 inches.

name: Beautiful Baroque Bride
description: These are a stunning example of large white Baroque pearls that are the perfect statement addition to a classic but simply designed wedding dress. Especially for the bride that's all about her pearl collection. Unusual, each strand is unique. We have a limited quantity of these beauties, so if these pearls ring your wedding bell don't delay and order now. This necklace is knotted with white silk and finished with a 14K Gold Filled hook and eye clasp. 19 inches. We are happy to create your necklace to your specific length. Matching earrings available upon request.

name: Small Coins, Savvy?
description: A wardrobe necessity, definitely this season if you pay attention to that sort of thing. You do, of course, your a stylish & cool lady who recognizes trendy trends from silly marketing trends. You know a classic piece when you see it. 24 inch, knotted white baby coin pearls w/ a 14 K gold Vermeil toggle clasp. Modern Classic.

name: A Pearl Study in Contrasts
description: A beautiful combination. Extra large pale peach coin pearls, a natural anomaly, these organically shaped beautiful pearls are exceptional and make even more of a statement next to the perfectly smooth pale peach coin pearls, which are equally as luminous as the larger pearls. Knotted with peach silk, finished with an interesting Sterling Silver contemporary clasp. 20 inches. Matching earrings upon request. Don't miss out on the one of a kind necklace.

name: Classic Too
description: Well, what could be more classic than a beautiful single strand of large, white, round pearls? Knotted with white silk and finished with a 14K Gold Filled hook and eye clasp, 19 inches. Sometimes your perfect dress calls for the classic look of this pretty strand. Our studio is happy to create this piece in a length that suits the wearer perfectly. Matching earring's upon request.

name: White Oval Pearls
description: The organic seed shape of these white pearls are a favorite of mine. This strand has a soft luminescence. Knotted and finished w/ a 14 K Vermeil hook & eye clasp, 21 inches. Perfect everyday pearl piece. Love it.

name: Pearls and Champagne
description: Hmmm. Are these the palest pink coin pearls or a soft champagne hue? I think if I was looking for a pale pink strand of exceptional coin pearls, this would be my choice. That said, I think some one who does not wear pink ( ME ), I would love this strand. Pearls that have a luminosity tend to change with light, this beautiful strand qualifies. Knotted with a very pale pink silk and finished with a 14K Gold Filled filigree, round box clasp. 19 inches. This strand may be ordered at the perfect length for you, matching earring's upon request.

name: Champagne Stick pearls
description: When strung, these pretty Champagne colored stick pearls create a casual look for those who prefer to wear their pearls in a less formal way. Of course, this necklace will stand up to a designer cocktail dress any evening. Alone or worn w/ a more classic necklace or two, a fun choice to have in your pearl stash. 14K GF Hook and Eye Clasp, 18 inches.

name: White Coin Pears, Lovely
description: Devoted. A perfect white coin pearl necklace. Straight forward, stylish, dependable. This piece will never disappoint. Can't find the perfect necklace for that special outfit? Dial me up. Basically, everyone should own a strand of knotted white coin pearls, it's one of my rules. 19 inches,14 K gold filled, oversized hook and eye clasp.

name: White Top Drilled Pearls
description: I love these pearls! Top drilled plump tear dropped shape pearls all lined up this way and that! These are not for an orderly individual. Casual, Care Free, Modern, Fun. These words come to mind when I see a strand like this. 17 inches, Sterling Silver toggle clasp.

name: White Coin Pearl opera Length Necklace
description: Let's talk about this. I love this piece, at 52 inches it's so much fun. But as we talked about in previous posts, options rule. So worn as a single strand, doubled, triple necklace or worn as a wrap around bracelet, not only is this piece beautiful but it multi tasks! Your so smart to purchase it, four pieces for the price of one. 3 sizes of white pearls, including my favorite, coins. 14 K Gold Filled clasp.

name: Pearls with Golden Glass Orb
description: A hand crafted Italian glass, gold foil hollow bead ( from our studio ) is simply strung on a gold tone chain and accented with 2 large white companion Pearls, 17 inches with 1.5 inch extension option.

name: Shimmer Cuff
description: Gold, Green and Champagne Pearls shimmer beautifully in this pretty cuff.  Love the visual weight and the multi-colored playfulness of this piece. So many options for wear. I see it with jeans and a chunky Winter sweater as easily as your favorite LBD. 14K GF clasp.

name: White Cornflake Pearls
description: Who doesn't love a pretty Keishi pearl? These white beauties are so luminescent & the top drilled element of the pearl creates it's own random design. Simple, but striking. Wonderful & dressy worn alone, or  a cool look mixed w/ other white pearl bracelets. Finished w/ a Sterling Silver toggle clasp, 7.5 inches.

name: Classic Coin Pearl Cuff
description: Love this basic classic triple strand Coin Pearl Cuff. So pretty, so Hollywood, no? A great addition to a Pearl Girls stash. Three sizes of shimmery white Pearls, 14K GF clasp.

name: Golden Swarovski Bracelet
description: These are Swarovski Crystal Pearls. Faux, yes, but such a pretty hue and weight to the bead. we couldn't resist. Alternating them with a transparent Swarovski yellow bead, this bracelet glows. Perfect bracelet for a Winter's day. 14K GF clasp and beads. 7.5 inches.

name: Evening In Maine
description: A delightful triple strand Pearl Cuff bracelet. Weighty in color and design, the Pearls are three hues of soft grey featuring three sizes of Pearls, Coin, Baroque and petit rounds. So pretty. Sterling Silver Clasp.

name: Champagne Coin Pearl Double Strand
description: Classic w/ a twist. White coin pearls & baby Champagne colored coin pearls are combined to create a double strand bracelet that will bring your casual outfit to a new level of cool. Not too serious, a fun piece to mix and match with other pearls in your stash. 7.5 inches, Sterling Silver clasp.

name: Remember Maine
description: A sweet reminder. Who can resist a charming bracelet? Featured here, a Maine light house and moose and a dangle of three top drilled pearls. On Vintage filigree link chain. 7.5 inches, 14K GF clasp.

name: Lavender Tone Keishi Pearls
description: When I am tired of Winter, my mind wanders to Spring, but really, there are so many pretty aspects to this season & a walk in nature reminds me of this. Frozen leaves, hmm. These pale Lavender tone pearls are a wonderful leaf shape and offer a whimsical design choice. Finished with a 14k Gold Filled Spring Ring clasp. 7.5 inches.

name: Ezmirellda's Egg Returns
description: Our very popular Ezmirelda's Egg earring is back. These sell quickly, so don't hesitate! The shape is lovely, not overwhelming, a pretty tonal white Pearl with petite hammered 14K GF accent beads and ear wires. Available in Sterling Silver as well, please indicate in comment section which metal you would prefer.

name: Cloud Pearl Drop
description: Poofy cloud shaped white Pearl drops from a double Brass and tiny gold tone chain band. Love the cool element of the contrasting chain size, double the fun. 7 inches.

name: Oval  Pearl Love
description: These are a rare shaped pearl, so unique I think. I have had a pair for years and wear them endlessly. A shimmery white pearl accented here with an elongated Sterling Silver oval bead, beautiful Sterling Silver custom ear wires.

name: Five Pearls and Blue
description: Five unique top drilled white Pearls and one luminous blue beauty, make a soft statement. So delightful. 14K GF ear wires.

name: White Cloud Pearl
description: A cloud of a Pearl. A beautiful white pillowy Pearl simply presented on classic Sterling Silver lever backs. These are a staple for every Pearl Girls collection. A must have. Great for everyday and evening wear.

name: Be still My Heart
description: A lovely heart shaped White Pearl with a beautiful Ocean Blue Swarovski Crystal, Sterling Silver bead and ear wire. You know a sweet heart who would love these.

name: White Coin Pearl Posts
description: Another pearl earring we all need. I mean need. There is a time sadly when we must wear an earring that does not dangle, swing or move in any way. Why compromise? These white coin pearl beauties are hand matched & finished with Sterling Silver posts and  large ear backs. Catch your movement in the light of these pretty earring's.

name: Copper Simplicity
description: A sweet, simple and very lightweight earring. Perfect for every day and a nice metallic to add to your Pearl stash. Three organic shaped copper pearls are accented with tiny hammered and larger smooth 14K GF beads. 14K GF  ear wires.

name: Big Sky Moon
description: The largest White Coins you have ever seen! What a visual impact these pearls have. Hanging 2 inches below the ear, accented with a tiny hammered gold bead on a beautiful leaf shaped 14K GF ear wire. Stunning.

name: Swinging On The Moon
description: Beautiful White Coin Pearls swing on a petite Sterling Silver Chain. The perfect pair of earring's for your holiday pearl wardrobe, You'll be the life of the party! Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Double Pearl Delight
description: Shimmery Peacock Grey colored Pearl with pretty white accent pearl. Great color combination, simple statement. Perfect every day or evening set. Sterling Silver ear wires.

name: Rockin' Rectangle Pearls
description: Rock the Caspar in these contemporary shaped white Pearls. A go-to pair of earring's that are interesting, but not too over the top for everyday. I love to wear mine all of the time. Accented with tiny hammered gold beads and 14K GR ear wires.

name: White Coin Pearl Classics
description: Everyone needs these classic Coin Pearl white earrings. Everyone. No exceptions. Beautiful luster on these plump white coin pearls, 14 K Gold Filled ear wires.

name: Pearls Everyday
description: Every Pearl girl needs these. Simple large white pearls with tiny Sterling Silver beads and French lever back's. Simple, elegant and necessary even if your a usually 14K gold girl like me, every once in a while Sterling rules the day. Why not be prepared?

name: Pale Pink Coin Pearl Earrings
description: She's a pale pink gal. Pale Pink Coin Pearl gal to be exact. But she does rock that Summer Straw fedora, no? These are a beautiful set of coin pearls, the delicate pale pink pearls are lovely. 14 K Gold Filled ear wires.

name: White Post's like Emiliy's
description: Pretty and plump, white pearl posts with Sterling Silver ear wires and nuts. You need these in your stash.

name: Classic Copper Pearl Strand
description: A lovely strand of round soft copper colored Pearls, knotted with gold silk and finished with a large classic  14K Vermeil Hook & Eye clasp, hammered, 14K Gold Fill. 20 inches.

name: Copper Coins and Rounds
description: An interesting double strand with golden Pearls, rounds and coins and mixed tiny gold beads. 18 inches and finished with a hammered oversized Hook and Eye clasp.

name: Double Gold Pearl Bar Necklace
description: Love this! Elongated soft gold toned Pearls combined with tiny gold Pearls on silk. This will be your Fall/Winter go to piece. At 20 inches it is so versatile. Looks great alone or with a series of gold chains. 14K Classic hook and eye clasp.

name: Pearl Chain Gold
description: Pretty gold Pearls, rice and tiny bead shape combine here to create a simple necklace, perfect for every day, but great mixed with your other favorite Pearl strands. 19 inches, 14K Gold Fill Spring Ring clasp.

name: Gold and Gold
description: Long gold toned Pearls are accented with pretty faceted Carnelian stones and suspended from hammered gold tone disks. We are entering the season of gold, when more is more when it comes to gold accessories. Yay for Winter I say! 14K Gold Fill ear wires.

name: Accent Pearl Earring
description: A simple go-to earring for Fall & Winter. A pretty pair of round buttery gold Pearls with !4K Gold Fill disk accent beads & ear wires.

name: Gold Pearl Bars
description: From the treasury. Elongated Pearls, perfect patina of gold. Simple, elegant, a perfect everyday earring. 14K Gold Fill French lever backs.

name: Swingy Pearl Fun
description: Pretty copper Pearls with 14K Gold Filled rice beads and ear wires. These are a great earring to wear when an earring is all you need, no competing necklace. Perfectly simple.

name: Golden Pearl Mixer
description: A pretty mix of long gold Pearls and tiny gold Pearls with 14K gold fill disk beads creates a chain like effect for this bracelet. Looks great worn alone or with other bracelets. 7.5 inches, 14K Gold Fill Spring Ring clasp and beads.

name: Pearl Double Fun Bracelet
description: Petit gold Pearls, faceted Carnelian stones and 14K gold beads in a double strand bracelet. Feels great on, the perfect everyday bracelet for Fall & Winter. Looks great alone or mixed with other bracelets. 7.5 inches, 14K gold fill Spring Ring clasp.

name: Pumpkin Nugget & Pearls
description: A perfect bracelet for the pearl lover..with a twist. A chunky, gorgeous Carnelian stone accents the buttery copper hued golden pearls. 7.5 inches, 14k Gold fill Spring Ring clasp and beads.

name: Fall Bauble Bracelet
description: A vividly colored and beautiful Carnelian with tiny gold Pearl accent hangs simply from a gold tone chain. Looks great alone or worn with other bracelets. 7.5 inches, 14K Gold Fill Spring ring clasp & beads.

name: Pearl Autumn
description: The last of my hand carved Jade chain link sections, so unusual and my favorite shade of green. When I found this pretty gold abstract shaped Pearl and combined it with a glorious Carnelian stone the combination reminded me of the Autumn leaves as they morph and change. Combined with a pretty gold chain, this pendant piece is a nice departure from the classic Pearl strand. 18 inches, 14K Gold Fill delicate chain.

name: jewel tone faceted crystal style earring
description: Forward Fall thinking. Can't help it, my garden is hinting at the change of season and as it sit's outside of the studio window's it's no wonder our thoughts turn to Fall design. These jewel tone faceted crystal style earring's are crisp hues, swingy & not too serious, take them from daytime casual or dress them up. You decide. We added a colored Pearl for accent, 14K gold filled ear wires.

name: Maruca Milli-Lu
description:
The Milli-Lu, sleek, sassy and deceivingly roomy! Gals love her because she stands up straight, no digging! This is a signature piece in the Maruca collection and can hold everything from your umbrella to your blow dryer! She’s a true testament to your funky flair. Small open scoop pocket on the front for quick access to cell phones, one small interior pocket. Originally $72.00

no returns on sale items.

name: Pearl with Turquoise Drop
description: Beautiful  band of brushed and hammered 14K Vermeil beads with the perfect Turquoise stone & tiny white pearl accent. Vermeil toggle, 8 inches. Nice alone or great to mix with other gold bracelets.

name: Resin Knot Cuff
description: Sweet petit resin knot cuff. Simple, interesting and lightweight design. You need one in every color!

name: Small Carved Cuff
description: Black lightweight carved resin cuff. One and a half inch width, a nice little, go with everything statement piece. Multiple colors available, great gift.

name: Black Carved Resin Cuff
description: Beautiful carved two inch resin cuff. A great piece that we have been carrying for years. Our customers order multiples and they make a great gift too.

name: Red Polka Dot Headband
description: Just the right amount of polka dot pop. Love this thin Red and White band with a tasteful elongated bow. No Minnie Mouse gal here! Comfortable band too. Was $24.00 on sale for 16.00. Also available in Camel with black dots.

name: Red Red Rose Headband
description: Simple and sweet and so lightweight. Thin comfortable band is wrapped in black silk allowing the perfect red rose to blossom in your hair. Also available in black. Was $24.00 on sale $16.00.

name: Turquoise Suede Floral Headband
description: Pretty and color current, this soft  petaled suede headband is just enough color with a bit of snap. Love the white pearls and Rhinestone accent. Very comfortable, headband lined with black silk. Available in chocolate brown.

name: Yoga Clips, Large
description: The best invention since sliced bread! These hair clips are a no - brainer for the smart & stylish woman on the go, They are not only beautiful & super strong, they are comfortable. The hinge mechanism is visible only from the side, no more unsightly metal spring. Great product, we love these. More colors available, contact us if you are looking for options.

name: Pearl Sea Foam
description: A linear piece of driftwood with a tiny strand of white pearls balancing in a single file of pretty. It reminds me of the edge of a wave retreating back to the sea with an edge of delicate seafoam following it. Hung from Sterling Silver hammered chain, 19 inches.

name: Cloudy Pearl Pendant with Wood
description: Love this piece, it's a grab & go for those morning's you are on a tear! Any simple white pearl earring & your ready to face the day, looking cool and stylish.It has everything, with each element complementing the next making this an instant go to Summer piece. This is an over your head 32 inch Copper chain with a 2.5 inch smooth,  tubular wooden pendant and fantastic Mabe cloud pearl riveted in place, Just because, a nice Copper pearl  finishes the design. So now, don't you agree?

name: Driftwood & Pearl Necklace
description: A 3 inch piece of driftwood in the shape of a gentle wave is accented with a tiny strand of sweet white pearls & hung from a hammered Sterling Silver Chain. 18 inches.

name: Blue Pearl Wood Bell
description: Interesting wooden piece from our ever growing collection. I love how the 2 rounded triangular shapes articulate on a carved wooden jump ring. Blue Keishi pearls are riveted in a simple pattern. 34 inches, over the head, no clasp. Easy for breezy Summer wear.

name: Pearl Drifting
description: A beautiful Creamy white Mabe Pearl, w/ 4 tiny white pearls, complement a pretty driftwood piece generously given to us by the sea years ago. The interesting Mabe pearl accents the gentle shape of the wood perfectly. 4 inch driftwood focal piece with an 18 inch Antigue brass chain & lobster claw clasp. One of a kind.

name: Sea Driftwood Treasures & 4 Pearls
description: Driftwood and Pearls, the heart of our newest collection. Wooden memories tumbled by the sea, driftwood pieces gathered years ago, rest on my desk, treating us to the beachy way-back machine on a cold Maine winters day. Pendant measures 2 inches in length, complimented with 4 sweet, slightly graduated white pearls, antique finish brass chain. 32 inch chain. One of a kind, a statement piece if your a coastal girl like me, you'll love this necklace.

name: Wood and Pearl Unusaul
description: An interesting white pearl, it reminds me of a windy sky over the river. Perched atop a gently curved wooden branch-like bead. 18 inches w/ a 2 inch extension chain. A one of a kind, perfect gift for the casual & creative pearl-gal in your life.

name: White Pearls and Silver
description: We have featured this popular, pretty Pearl before & finally sourced another strand. Perfect pretty egg-shaped white pearl dangles on Sterling Silver hook. A great everyday Pearl earring.

name: Lavender Coin Pearls,  Long for them!
description: Loving the baby lavender pearls this Spring. Images of beautiful blooms are coming to mind when I see these, Crocus, Lilac & Iris, Grape Hyacinth, the list goes on. These sweet coins are knotted, I have added a few tiny purple/blue pearls & finished w/ a simple 14 K Gold Fill spring clasp. 25 inches.

name: White Pearls and Black Crystal
description: Simple, easy. Just what you were looking for. An earring that will match just about any pearl necklace, a pretty white pearl w/ 2 tiny bicone shaped Swarovski crystals, sweet gold tone vintage chain link & 14 K hammered Gold Filled ear wires. I knew I would find it at Future Pearl!

name: Black Pearl Single
description: Sometimes it's just good to be alone. In this case, this simple bracelet is just the thing. A large black pearl with Bali Silver finial accent, hung on a 7.5 inch gun metal chain w/ lobster claw clasp. That's it. Of course, if I wanted to be social, I would combine this piece w/ a few simple black pearl bracelets or Silver bangles, either way, a great look.

name: Copper Stick Pearls
description: Fun! A barrel of monkey's! I have had this polished Horn, carved pendant piece for a long time. I am a lover of monkey's ( yes, the band, too. ) The copper colored stick pearls and Amber seemed just the thing to let these guys out of the "one of, can I part w/ this? " drawer. So here they are for you to enjoy. Accented w/ Amber pebbles & tiny chocolate seed pearls & finished w/ a 14 K, matte finish Vermeil hook & eye clasp. 23 inches.

name: White Oval Pearls w/ Amber
description: The debate continues. My partner says this is not an Amber focal bead, I say it is. I have been carrying around this bead for YEARS, afraid to add it to a piece, as I am not positive of it's "identity". Well, I needed something to accent this funky strand of mixed Amber pebbles, so here she is in all her unidentified glory. I love the color and feel of this bead and the white oval pearls that present her to the world. Love her for her mystery...& buy this piece for her pearl stash. 19 inches, 14 K Gold Filled lobster clasp.

name: Blue Leaf Pearls
description: The last thing you will be is blue when you are wearing this necklace. Deep midnight blue tear drop pearls knotted with dark Saphire Swarovski crystals are combined to create this interesting piece. The top drilled pearl when strung present in a clustered fashion offering visual interest. Finished w/ a 14 K Gold Filled toggle clasp, 19 inches. Sexy.

name: Copper Tone Pearls and Amber
description: A simple strand of Copper colored pearls combined with smooth Amber pebbles. The Amber is accented w/ yellow topaz colored Swarovski crystals, allowing the warmth of the Amber to be seen & giving the piece a chain like effect. I have several customers who collect this color of pearl exclusively to mix w/ their Gold chain necklace & bracelet collections. 14 K Gold Filled spring ring clasp. 22 inches

name: White Rice Pearls and Wood Chain
description: A statement piece with all the right elements. Pretty white large rice pearls, carved wooden chain & 2 sizes gold tone chain links, 14 K Gold filled spring ring clasp. An extension clasp gives you options. This is certainly not a necklace for everyone or for every day, but I know it has power & becomes your outfit as soon as you wear it. Don't be shy, you know you need this. 24-26 inches w/ extension.

name: Green Pearls With Wood
description: Well, we all know green wood won't keep the fire going or your honey warm, but this necklace will. Perfectly shaped gorgeous green pearls knotted and strung w/ football shaped carved wooden beads, smooth and lightweight and unexpected, dontcha think? I just love the wood & pearl combo ( in case I haven't mentioned that enough). 21 inches, 14 K brush finish vermeil hook & eye clasp.

name: Pale Pink Pearls Chicklet Shaped Fun
description: I was so pleased to find this beautiful strand of Salmon toned pearls in a fun chicklet shape. Presented simply, you can really appreciate the beauty of this strand, the pearls are slightly textured which adds to their shimmery quality. Knotted w/ pale peach silk & finished w/ a Sterling Silver Snail clasp, 18 inches. A nice color addition to your pearl collection.

name: Amber and Stick Pearls
description: Amber love. Pretty abstract shapes of soft Amber strung with chocolate colored center drilled stick pearls, 7.5 inches of Earth toned love. Finished w/ a 14 K Gold Filled Spring clasp. Ahh, I love you, I really do.

name: Copper Stick Pearls and Amber
description: So many possibilities with Amber & Pearls. A pretty Amber focal bead is framed w/ a tiny chocolate seed pearl, crystals & pebble shaped Amber beads, finished w/ coppery chocolate colored, center drilled stick pearls. 8 inches, 14 K Gold Filled Spring Ring clasp.

name: Citrine and Pearls
description: I was never a big fan of tiny faceted stones, but lately I am drawn to them & these little top drilled Citrine are no exception.These stones are delicate & so pretty. Here mixed w/ round Amber beads & tiny chocolate seed pearls creating a delicate and textural piece.

name: Brown Seed Pearls & Amber
description: Around you wrist, the glow of Amber. A sweet 7 3/4 inch bracelet accented with chocolate colored seed pearls. Finished w/ a 14 K Gold Filled Spring Ring. So light weight, worn alone or looks pretty w/ other Amber or gold bracelets.

name: White Oval Pearl w/ Vine  Lightweight
description: No, an interesting firm & dried vine. I have designed series around wood & pearls in the past & I love the combination, but these beads offer something more, almost a weightless element that allows them to be a focal component w/o mass. Dropping from the vine is an organic shaped white pearl. Accented w. 14 K Gold Filled beads & ear wires, these are a favorite of mine.

name: Grey Round Pearls w/ Amethyst Glass Chain
description: I know, grey pearls with gold finding's? Who does that? I guess I do, the pearl was a perfect match for the transparent Amethyst colored Italian glass chain, and the 14 K gold filled accents just seemed to work. They are a delightful earring for day or evening. Trust me.

name: Chocolate Italian Glass orb
description: It is almost heart day after all. Go for it. Indulge with these Italian chocolate colored glass chain loop earrings. Hung from 14 K Gold Filled ear wires. Delicious!

name: Italian Cobalt Glass with Gold Leaf Globe
description: I know, I know, these are not pearl earrings. But I do love them, these have been a popular choice from our studio for years, so I thought I would share them w/ you. I love to make hollow forms w/ Italian glass. It's addicting. These are a rich Cobalt blue w/ 24K gold leaf & finished w/ 14K Gold filled beads and ear wires. Lightweight as they are hollow, with just the right amt. of swing. What do you think?

name: Black Pearl with Iolote
description: Iolite, that is. I guess I just have Spring on my mind today. These little flowers are sparkling w/ tiny Iolite stones on each petal & in it's center.  Silver Bali w/ a round black pearl & Pyrite accent bead. So Pretty.

name: Pearly Peacock
description: Not exactly feathers, more petal like, the color of these pearls is so pretty, deep purple/blue with green shimmers. Playful and unpretentious, this is a great little piece to add to your pearl collection. 7.5 inches, finished with a Sterling Silver Spring Ring clasp.

name: White Coin Pearls Stacked!
description: My favorite pearl with a twist. White coin pearls, stacked simply to form a feels- so- good- on- my- wrist bracelet. Simple & eye catching, we love this piece for the pearl girl who wants something a bit different. 7.5 inches, 14 K Gold Filled spring ring clasp.

name: White Keishi Pearls Petals
description: Love these top drilled white Keishi pearls, don't you? This piece reminds me of flower petals woven into a chain w/ round, white companion pearls and the perfect Sterling Silver floral clasp, 24 inches. It's obvious that this is the perfect necklace for the garden lover in your life.

name: Copper Pearl Coins & Rounds
description: To some that may mean gold, but to me, well, copper sings. So warm and of the earth. In this 18 inch double strand, there are multiple reasons to sing the praises of this pretty metallic. Copper colored coin pearls are combined w/ large almost round gold and red-tone pearls & brushed gold beads. An over size hammered 14 K Gold Vermeil clasp completes the necklace. If your looking for something different, you just found it, don't hesitate, make it yours!

name: Amethyst with Attitude
description: Pearl girl with a secondary crush on this pretty stone? This is the piece for you. Large top drilled Amethyst nuggets surround your wrist with the power of purple. Of course, I couldn't resist adding a smattering of small white stick pearls to keep it real. 7.5 inches w/ Sterling Silver clasp. Just in time for the party season!

name: Black Peacock Petals
description: I love these pearls, especially in this striking shade of deep blue. Or is it purple, navy w/ teal accents? It's all of these & more. A reflective, light weight pearl bracelet, adds a textural element to any outfit. 7.5 inch Sterling Silver spring ring clasp.

name: Large Grey Round Pearls & Stick Pearls
description: Am I lover of the classic round pearl or am I adventurous, loving the myriad of shapes offered in fresh water pearls? You don't have decide with this piece. A combination of steely grey stick pearls & dark grey 10mm round pearls, accented with Pyrite beads. 18 inches, Sterling Silver over sized hook and eye clasp.

name: Blue Peacock Pearls
description: I love the organic shape of these pearls. 18 inches of dramatic richly colored deep eggplant colored pearls. Sterling Silver toggle clasp.

name: White Pearl 14K Gold Filled
description:
Our Coin Pearl Ring is hand crafted, time consuming yes, but the only way to ensure the uniqueness of each pearl is presented at its best.  Only high quality pearls with good nacre development can withstand the hammered rivet process. Pearls of this quality and size are not always readily available, this along with the slow, careful production process at times results in limited availability. The examples pictured here are not the actual rings for sale. Your ring will be unique and vary according to fantastic pearls that are available at the time of purchase.  Rings are in  half sizes from size 6 to size 9. 

In time your pearl will move on it’s rivet, 
this is not a structural flaw!The rivet which secures you pearl in place passes completely thru the pearl, there is no cause for alarm,continue to enjoy your unique pearl ring.

name: White Pearl, Sterling Silver
description:
Our Coin Pearl Ring is hand crafted, time consuming yes, but the only way to ensure the uniqueness of each pearl is presented at its best.  Only high quality pearls with good nacre development can withstand the hammered rivet process. Pearls of this quality and size are not always readily available, this along with the slow, careful production process at times results in limited availability. The examples pictured here are not the actual rings for sale. Your ring will be unique and vary according to fantastic pearls that are available at the time of purchase.  Rings are in  half sizes from size 6 to size 9. 

In time your pearl will move on it’s rivet, 
this is not a structural flaw! The rivet which secures you pearl in place passes completely thru the pearl, there is no cause for alarm, continue to enjoy your unique pearl ring.

name: Pearls & Einstein Ring
description: Feeling brainy? Want to? We picked this Granite ring up many years ago at a trade show. The vendor had fashioned a line of jewelry made from the cobblestones taken from the street in front on the gentleman's home. Of course, we couldn't resist adding a petite white coin pearl to this ring. Genius. Size 10. One of a kind, like Einstein.
